definition: (of two performers) to speak or sing alternately/to be fit for the purposes of a job or task/(of food) to suit sb's taste
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
comic crosstalk/formalized comic dialogue between two stand-up comics: funny man 逗哏[dou4 gen2] and straight man 捧哏[peng3 gen2]
to arrange to give the same story

sentences.english: You can often save a person's life by breathing into his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 採用口對口呼吸常能搶救一個人的生命。

sentences.english: He remembered learning mouth-to-mouth resuscitation in a scuba diving course years before.
sentences.chinese: 他想起幾年前在潛水課上學的口對口人工呼吸。

sentences.english: The lifeguard used mouth-to-mouth resuscitation to save the child's life.
sentences.chinese: 救護員使用了口對口人工呼吸法來挽救那孩子的生命。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the curative effect of contradrainage and thread drawing method to treat high anal horseshoe fistula (HAHS).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討對口引流掛線在治療高位馬蹄瘻的效果。

sentences.english: Lip- synching happens all the time in performances.
sentences.chinese: 對口型在表演中很常見。

sentences.english: I have nothing noteworthy and my job had nothing to do with my major.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有什麼引人注目的成就，工作又和專業不對口。

sentences.english: The waiters mime to records playing on the jukebox.
sentences.chinese: 侍者們配合自動唱機裏播放的唱片對口型假唱。

sentences.english: Have you find any job that you are interested in?
sentences.chinese: 我只找到幾個職位與我的專業對口。

sentences.english: The rhymed dialogue between the two performers is very interesting.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個人說的對口詞真有意思。

sentences.english: Stand-up comedy is very popular with the public.
sentences.chinese: 對口相聲是深受人們喜愛的表演形式。

sentences.english: My favourite band were on TV last night but they just lip-synced the songs.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡的樂隊在昨晚電視節目上對口型演唱。

sentences.english: This job does not match my specialty.
sentences.chinese: 這個工作與我的專業不對口。

sentences.english: I must try to start his breathing at once by using the mouth-to-mouth way.
sentences.chinese: 我必須立即用口對口吹氣的方法給他做人工呼吸。

sentences.english: The Shanghai public security condolences go to Dujiangyan to support the police force, I visit them with the CPPCC delegation.
sentences.chinese: 隨政協代表團，慰問上海公安赴都江堰對口支援警隊。

sentences.english: In the afternoon, Chinese business representatives hold match-making conferences with Venezuela counterparts.
sentences.chinese: 下午，中國企業代表與委方代表進行了對口洽談。

sentences.english: Some of those candidates are going to have exactly the industry experience they're looking for.
sentences.chinese: 而且，從業經驗與招聘職位對口的求職者也不乏其人。

definition: specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
to establish (a unit or department)/staffing structure (excluding temporary and casual staff)
an overall plan/to plan an entire project as a whole
to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
